Text:
Thanks for the post PhillySoul - These are *very* cool. If any of you only watch one song, check out Smokey
doing ?Sara Smile? along with Darryl, then getting caught off guard when Darryl segues
into one of Smokey?s all-time hits. Smokey doesn?t seem to remember the lyric even
to such a simple song so Darryl does most of the singing. Priceless.
